name: newsinshort
0:
”Alexa, ask short news for science news”
”Alexa, ask short news for news”
”Alexa, ask short news for news in sports”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: short news
des: Provides headlines for different categories such as business, sports, world, politics, technology, startup, entertainment, miscellaneous, hatke, Indian news. Sourced from the famous in-short news app. InShorts is known for its short and updated news. This is the first version and has basic functionalities to read headlines.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
